text: The Detroit Public School League (PSL) is a high school conference based in the city of Detroit, Michigan and is governed by Detroit Public Schools (DPS) Office of Athletics. The PSL is affiliated with the MHSAA. ==Current members== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! School ! Nickname ! Colors ! Enrollment ! Ben Carson co-ops with Douglass (boys sports) and International Academy (girls sports) while Detroit School of Arts co-ops with West Side Academy * Detroit Delta Prep and Detroit Edison Academy are charter schools not affiliated with Detroit Public Schools * Detroit Edison Academy is an independent in football as they did not want to play Cass Tech ==Sports== ===Boys=== :{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" width=240px |+ !colspan=0 align=center |Baseball |- | Detroit Cass Tech |- | Detroit Central Collegiate |- | Detroit Cody |- | Detroit Collegiate Prep |- | Detroit Communication Media Arts |- | Detroit Denby |- | Detroit East English Village |- | Detroit Henry Ford |- | Detroit Martin Luther King |- | Detroit Mumford |- | Detroit Osborn |- | Detroit Pershing |- | Detroit Renaissance |- | Detroit Western International |} :{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" width=240px |+ !colspan=0 align=center |Basketball |- !
